data.title: TROVE: Theoretical ROVibrational Energies
data.name: TROVE
data.description: Theoretical ROVibrational Energies: A variational program for accurate nuclear motion calculations

evidence: "Theoretical ROVibrational Energies: A variational program for accurate nuclear motion calculations" (describes a program used to perform scientific calculations, i.e., an application).
"The full documentation can be found here https://docs.spectrove.org/" (indicates domain-specific scientific documentation, supporting direct research use).
"See https://github.com/Trovemaster/TROVE/tree/develop for the latest version of the TROVE program." (distribution via GitHub source repository).
